personalInfo.tagline: I believe in creating web apps that are effortless to use, a joy to maintain, and make lives easier. Full-stack developer with 10+ years of experience and a passion for front-end.

responsibilities.description: Collaborative design and delivery of high-quality, custom web applications across a diverse client portfolio using modern DevOps practices.
Architected and developed an automated booking platform for a Zurich train travel startup using Angular and .NET Core, leveraging Terraform to manage the Azure infrastructure.
Supported the functional evolution and migration of a major insurance platform to a cloud-native Azure environment, modernizing a legacy Angular and Java stack
Led the modernization of internal booking tools by re-implementing core features with Angular, GraphQL, and PostgreSQL, directly supporting the client's rapid scaling and operational growth.
Designed and prototyped next-generation cloud-based serverless web application using Angular and AWS Lambda to integrate with leading CMS
Developed and optimized the AngularJS yallo, Lebara, and Swype websites, online shop, and mobile application
Optimization of user experience and conversion rate
Development of new white-label web app to scan an ID or passport as proof of identification
Migrated substantial parts of the .NET monolith to dedicated JavaScript (React), NodeJS and Elixir (micro-)services
Implemented A/B experiments around subscription and payments UI
Maintained and supported various Elixir, NodeJs, React and .NET services, mainly in the payment area, including integrations with WorldPay and PayPal
Developed and maintained a web application which simplifies reporting financial data to the Swiss regulator FINMA. The reporting process could be reduced from eight to two weeks.

Responsible for the maintenance and integration of the system reporting Solvency II data to various European regulators. The systems include an in-house developed solution as well as a third-party solution. Tasks include integrating new updates provided by the vendor, administrating a Suse linux server, as well as providing bug fixes and new features.
As a member of the Solution Quality Assurance team, I was part of several code reviews on other projects.
Implemented a web application to calculate Key Performance Indicators (KPI) based on project data.
Developed and executed tests to compare performance of various web services such as SOAP, remote EJB and REST.

Graduated as best student of the year in the Canton of Zürich, which was awarded a scholarship for ZHAW (Züricher Hochschule der Angewandten Wissenschaften)
Attended the senior year of high school as an exchange student
